reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Indonesia programme support, Partners Meeting 2017 and study on seagrass meadows

description.narrative: This project assists Siemenpuu partners in Indonesia concerning the project management, and it monitors the projects together with Siemenpuu programme coordinator and Indonesia working group. Additionally, communication between project partners, Siemenpuu and Advisory Group of Indonesia will be enhanced i.a. through visits, electronic media communication, other communication and a partner meeting that will be hold in October-November 2017. In addition, on this project well make report that will increase awa reness about situation of the seagrass and the influencing factors. The results of the report will be informed also in Finland. This project will increase administrative capacity of the partners, increase knowledge and communication of the particular curre nt themes (peat swamp forests, mangroves, indigenous people, and community based conservation) and it also improves the ability of Siemenpuu to follow progress and results of the program partners. Partner meeting will be hold either in Pekanbaru, Riau or Bogori, Java. Members from all partner organizations, Advisory Group and Siemenpuu will be invited for the meeting. www.kaoemtelapak.org

In addition, on this project well make report that will increase awa reness about situation of the seagrass and the influencing factors. The results of the report will be informed also in Finland. This project will increase administrative capacity of the partners, increase knowledge and communication of the particular curre nt themes (peat swamp forests, mangroves, indigenous people, and community based conservation) and it also improves the ability of Siemenpuu to follow progress and results of the program partners. Partner meeting will be hold either in Pekanbaru, Riau or Bogori, Java. Members from all partner organizations, Advisory Group and Siemenpuu will be invited for the meeting. www.kaoemtelapak.org
